mapper.select: SELECT rl.likeSeq as likeSeq, rl.userSeq as userSeq, rl.reviewSeq as reviewSeq, r.title as title, r.content as content, r.writer as writer, r.viewCnt as viewCnt, DATE_FORMAT(r.createdDate, "%Y:%M:%D %H:%I:%S") as createdDate, u.name as name, u.nickname as nickname, u.role as role, u.position as position, u.phoneNumber as phoneNumber, u.img as img, u.orgimg as orgimg FROM RLikes rl JOIN reviews r ON rl.reviewSeq = r.reviewSeq JOIN users u ON rl.userSeq = u.userSeq WHERE rl.userSeq = #{userSeq} AND rl.reviewSeq = #{reviewSeq}
SELECT * FROM Reviews vr JOIN RLikes vrl ON vr.reviewSeq = vrl.reviewSeq WHERE vrl.userSeq = #{userSeq}
SELECT * FROM Users u JOIN RLikes vrl ON u.userSeq = vrl.userSeq WHERE vrl.reviewSeq = #{reviewSeq}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM RLikes WHERE userSeq = #{userSeq} AND reviewSeq = #{reviewSeq}
